channel.title: How do I limit starter kits for new players?
channel.description: I want to limit starter kits for example 2 starter kits per ip... please help this is becomin a problem

usman <3333.

I’ll find the code for you. hold up.

item.title: How do I limit starter kits for new players?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

You can make a token for the player and set it to 1 when they have used it. This won’t work on IP, but on every one account. You can stop making people transfer the starter kits by just limiting the accounts that may login per IP. You can do this by searching up a tutorial, I’m certain there is one.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I limit starter kits for new players?
